data.title: Henning May's bio: Height, gay, songs, AnnenMayKantereit, and net worth
data.meta_description: Henning May is famous for being a member of the rock band AnnenMayKantereit. So, what are some unknown facts about him? Learn more about this talented artist here.
data.text:
Some of the world’s greatest bands have come from Germany. From early pioneers like Accept to more recent acts like AnnenMayKantereit, German rock bands have consistently pushed the boundaries of what is possible in rock music. But what is a great band without talented artists? The likes of Henning May are why AnnenMayKantereit has grown in popularity, thanks to his distinctive rough voice. So, who is he?

Born Henning Gemke, Henning May is a young and talented German musician. He is famously recognized for being a singer and frontman of AnnenMayKantereit, a German pop rock band from Cologne. The band was formed in 2011, and he has been a member since then.

Henning May’s profile summary

Full nameHenning GemkeNicknameHenning May GenderMale Date of birth13th January 1992 Age31 years old as of 2023 Zodiac signCapricorn Place of birth Cologne, GermanyCurrent residenceCologne, GermanyNationalityGerman EthnicityWhite ReligionChristianity SexualityStraight Height in feet6’ 1’’Height in centimetres 185 Hair colourDark brownEye colourBrown SiblingsOneRelationship statusSingleSchoolSchiller-Gymnasium High SchoolProfessionGerman artist Net worth $3 million

Henning May’s biography

Henning May was born on 13th January 1992 in Cologne, Germany. How old is Henning May? The artist is 31 years old as of 2023. He was raised in the Slyz region together with his older brother. It is alleged that his parents divorced in the early 2000s.

Due to the divorce, he was raised single-handedly by his father, who was a school teacher. Henning and his father spent much time together, developing a strong bond. They played football and travelled to different places. His father also taught him how to play the guitar.

What nationality is Henning May? He holds a German nationality with a white ethnic background. He attained his education from Schiller-Gymnasium High School in Cologne-Sulz. He was part of the Schiller-made music program in school.

Career

Henning began his career in 2011, after his high school graduation. He joined hands with Christopher Annen and Severin Kantereit to form a German pop-rock band known as the AnnenMayKantereit. The band’s name combines its three member’s last names.

Initially, the trio were street musicians in Cologne. Later, bassist Lars Lötgering joined them at a jam session on the Uniwiese in Cologne. However, his stay in the band was short-lived because he left in 2014. Upon his departure, electric bassist Malte Huck joined the band from 2014 to 2020.

AnnenMayKantereit’s initial releases

The rock band released its first self-recorded album in 2013. It was presented at a release party in Building 9 in Cologne. Afterwards, all their songs were primarily published on their YouTube channel.

In 2015, the music band signed a recording deal with Universal Music Group (UMG), marking the beginning of their professional music career. The band recorded their first EP, It Will Work Somehow, at the Hansa Studios in Berlin.

The EP was released in October 2015 on the Vertigo Berlin label. AnnenMayKantereit’s breakthrough came with the release of Allex nix Konkretes. The album reached first place in the German charts and bagged a triple gold award.

In 2015, he collaborated with the KIZ music band by making a guest appearance in their song, Hurra die Welt geht unter. The song was a hit, reaching number 31 on the German charts. In 2019, he released the Vermissen song featuring German female rapper Juju.

Together with the band, Henning has been part of great albums and singles releases, including:

AnnenMayKantereit’s accolades

Over the years, Henning and the band's effort and unmatched talent haven't gone unnoticed. They have bagged numerous awards and nominations, including:

2015 - Nominee for the 1LIVE Krone in the Best Live Act category

2016 - Nominee for the 1LIVE Krone in the Best Live Act category

2017 - Winner of the Echo in the Band Pop National Category

2017 - Winner of the Echo in the Newcomer National Category

2019 - Winner of the 1LIVE Krone in the Best Band category

2021 - Winner of the Holger Czukay Prize for Pop Music from the City of Cologne

Sexuality

Is Henning May gay? No, May is not gay. His sexual orientation has been the subject of public speculation, largely because of the ambiguity surrounding his personal life. In addition, the absence of confirmation regarding his sexual orientation worsens the rumours.

Girlfriend and dating history

Who is Henning May dating? Unfortunately, he has not shared details about his romantic life. Even though his career is an open book, he prefers to keep his personal life away from the limelight. In addition, there is no information about his dating history.

Henning May’s body measurements

What is Henning May's height? The German musician is 6 feet 1 inch. He has not shared details about his other body statistics, such as his weight, chest, biceps, and waist measurements. He has dark brown hair and brown eyes.

Net worth

How much is Henning May's net worth? The acclaimed singer has an estimated net worth of $3 million as of 2023. He makes money from singing, which is his primary source of income. He is part of the German music band AnnenMayKantereit.

Henning May’s fast facts

Who is Henning May? Henning May is an acclaimed German artist and AnnenMayKantereit pop rock band member.

How old is Henning May? Henning May is 31 years old as of 2023. He was born on 13th January 1992 in Cologne, Germany.

What nationality is Henning May? Henning May holds a German nationality with a white ethnic background.

Who is the lead singer of AnnenMayKantereit? Henning May is the lead singer of AnnenMayKantereit. His rough voice is the group’s distinctive feature.

Who sings with Henning May? Henning May sings with Christopher Annen, Severin Kantereit, and Sophie Chassee. Lars Lötgering and Malte Huck are the band’s former members.

How much is Henning May's net worth? Henning May has an estimated net worth of $3 million as of 2023. Music is his primary source of income.

What instruments does Henning May play? Henning May plays the piano, ukulele, accordion, and guitar.

Henning May - Final word

Henning May is a highly acclaimed artist and one of the key members of AnnenMayKantereit pop rock music band. While his songs easily penetrate the hearts of his audiences, his boyish appearance contrasts with a mature, hard voice and deliberately aloof performance. He is a role model and inspiration to many.
